title: Bojun Tomigaya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of Chaya restaurant group, this one, on the 2nd floor of Hanamasa grocery store, serves fish as well macrobiotic lunch plate and vegan curry & rice. At dinner around 70% of the appetizers are vegan/macrobiotic and at least 1 pasta and 1 curry & rice are vegan/macrobiotic. Has organic wine, macrobiotic sweets, weekday afternoon tea. Menu in Japanese and English. Free Wi-Fi. Near Yoyogi Hachiman station (Odakyu Line) South exit or Yoyogi Koen station (Chiyoda Line) #1 exit.
